name: 銀聖戦神ガイナロック2
summary: 2125. Half a year after the first incident. This time the SIS crew stumbles upon another ghost spaceship. Having found nothing, they move on, but two girls develop some body abnormalities. What kind of disease is brought from the abandoned spaceship?
info:

  • 音楽: 荒川 憲一
